name: @kcp/functions
description: A basic plugin which adds reloadable functions to Klasa
author: KlasaCommunityPlugins

scripts.test:lint: npx tslint 'dist/*.ts' && npx eslint --config .eslintrcmd.json --ext md guides && npx markdownlint guides README.md
scripts.docs: yarn add discordjs/discord.js dirigeants/klasa && npx tsc && npx dg --source dist --custom guides/.docconfig.json --output dist/docs.json --logging
